title: Eternal City Xoap Backup
description:
This is not your typical torrent.  It's a website, as of 1/20/2014.

The reason for this is freedom of speech.  My hosting gets sabotaged,
posts deleted, and emails disappear.  If somebody doesn't like this
website that much then I feel desperate to share it.  I'm paranoid,
but 5 or so years of being gang-stalked will do that to you.

The pages here contain ideas that are based on pudding, because the
proof is in the pudding.  I hope it can spark conversation, the ideas
of your own, and hone our understanding of truth.  Please seed it,
share it, even host it.  Anything to combat those people who try to
prevent us from finding any actual solutions.

Good luck, that we prevail in the challenge of existence.
